issue.title: [CF 1133] Lava lash, show GCD instead of charge CD
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

7.3.2 r1

For Enhance Shaman with Echo of the Elements talent - Just want an icon for Lava Lash to show standard GCD sweep ("Allow Global Cooldown not working as usual"). It does show a sweep timer, but the timer is for the time until a new charge is ready, which I don't care about on this particular icon.

comments.body:
Its working exactly as intended. Allow Global Cooldown doesn't force the icon to show the GCD when its happening - it simply allows it to show if that's what the data is reporting.

There are no plans to implement what you're asking for.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
